channel.title: Help Please!
channel.description: Ok, So I made this mini-game on my 508 Palidino 76 where you slay zombies and receive points, the thing is the points do not save so when you log you lose them all, how can I make it so it does save?

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Liru Liru
item.description:
@Liru wrote:

Ok, So I made this mini-game on my 508 Palidino 76 where you slay zombies and receive points, the thing is the points do not save so when you log you lose them all, how can I make it so it does save?
